ModMetaData.name: Rimhammer 30,000
ModMetaData.author: 20-Four Systems
ModMetaData.description:
As the Horus Heresy rages across the galaxy, the forces of the Imperium arrive on the Rim.
Play out your own scenario as you take Loyalist against Traitor for the fate of all reality.
Declare your allegiance by playing a Legion, or make your own Legion with your choice of gene-seed.
Let the die be cast.
Codex release (v1.1) - Added 4 preset Ideoligions; Imperial cult, Chaos cult, Loyalist chapter and Traitor chapter. - Added 3 Ideoligion structures; Imperial, Chaos and Chapter. - Added 3 Ideoligion styles; Imperial, Chaos and Chapter. - Added 1 weapon style; Chapter style Charge Rifle (Lasgun). - Added 2 Ideogram styles; Imperial and Chaos. - Minor fixes and updates.
